name: Waaship
author: Waaship

sections.description:
WaaShip is an all-in-one cloud-based supply chain system developed to help ecommerce businesses scale painlessly, established by tech-aficionados and experienced ecommerce practitioners.

WaaShip is built specifically to help merchants run their ecommerce businesses as efficiently as possible. Manage orders and inventory from multiple sources, ship locally and internationally at rates we’ve pre-negotiated for you.

Why Waaship

=Omnichannel Order Management=
Manage your orders and costs centrally, no matter how many storefronts you sell from

=Real-time Inventory Syncing=
Automatically keeping your inventory numbers accurate, everywhere

=Sell globally, instantly=
Immediately plug-in to our network of courier partners and extend your global reach

Learn more about WaaShip at https://bit.ly/3JmdYaj
sections.changelog:
1.0.8
– Support virtual goods to determine shipping method

– Adjust CVS Compatibility

1.0.6
– Adjust CVS Compatibility

v1.0.5
– Reset selected cvs on checkout

v1.0.1
– Fix bug

v1.0.0
– Waaship CVS
